#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int T;
	//cout<<sizeof(double);
	long long N,K;
	double R1,R2;
	cin>>T;
	for(int i=0;i<T;i++){
		cin>>N>>K;
		R1=ceil(((2*(double)K+1)-sqrt((2*(double)K+1)*(2*(double)K+1)-8*(double)N))/2);
		R2=ceil(((2*K+1)+sqrt((2*K+1)*(2*K+1)-8*N))/2);
		if((R1>0)&&(R1<=K)){
			cout<<(long long)(K-R1)<<"\n";
		}
		/*else if((R2>0)&&(R2<=K)){
			cout<<(long long)(K-R2);
		}*/
		else{
			cout<<-1<<"\n";
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
